advisory.synopsis: scap-security-guide bug fix and enhancement update
advisory.topic: An update for scap-security-guide is now available for Rocky Linux 8.
advisory.description: The scap-security-guide project provides a guide for configuration of the system from the final system's security point of view. The guidance is specified in the Security Content Automation Protocol (SCAP) format and constitutes a catalog of practical hardening advice, linked to government requirements where applicable. The project bridges the gap between generalized policy requirements and specific implementation guidelines.
